name: Conquest Manager
description:
Collect cards, manage your deck and play a tabletop game with cards!

The game is on Alpha version. Singleplayer game type and Multiplayer available, you can play with bots or with real players!
Two modes available: Easy and Normal. Choosing mode indicates how big is table to play. It is 4 players game, you can also play against 1, 2 or 3 players.

Gameplay tactical features


Table cards - Conquer creatures, use your hand cards to throw away every single enemy. Use your spell cards to confuse your enemy and overtake everyone to be the best strategist. Explore table, place your creatures don't let an enemy to sweep them away.


Boss - is the common creature that feels uncomfortable and makes you in tense. Prepare, think, make plans, because it comes unpredictable. Manage your cards and make a strike to be the conqueror.

War camps - Raid each other camps. Be active, because it depends on when you can raid. Settle up your army, attack enemy camp to make a significant damage or defend yourself not letting enemies to get closer to you.
